nodes.name: depositCollateral
withdrawCollateral
takeOutLoan
repay

nodes.documentation:
@notice Liquidate a loan if it is expired or undercollateralised
@param loanID uint256 The ID of the loan to be liquidated
nodes.name: liquidateLoan

nodes.documentation:
@notice Get a list of all loans for a borrower
@param borrower address The borrower's address
nodes.name: getBorrowerLoans
depositCollateral
withdrawCollateral
takeOutLoan
repay

nodes.documentation:
@notice Liquidate a loan if it is expired or undercollateralised
@param loanID uint256 The ID of the loan to be liquidated
nodes.name: liquidateLoan

nodes.documentation:
@notice Get a list of all loans for a borrower
@param borrower address The borrower's address
nodes.name: getBorrowerLoans

params.borrower: address The address of the loan borrower.
params.loanID: uint256 The ID of the loan the collateral is for
uint256 The ID of the loan to be liquidated

params.amount: uint256 The amount of tokens to pay back to the loan
params.loanID: uint256 The ID of the loan the payment is for

takeOutLoan(uint256,uint256,uint256,uint.details: collateral ratio is a percentage of the loan amount that's required in collateralthe percentage will be *(10**2). I.e. collateralRatio of 5244 means 52.44% collateralis required in the loan. Interest rate is also a percentage with 2 decimal points.

params.amountBorrow: uint256 The initial amount to draw out for the loan
params.collateralRatio: uint256 The ratio of colalteral to principal required
params.interestRate: uint256 The interest rate of the loan
params.maxLoanAmount: uint256 The maximum amount of tokens allowed
params.numberDays: uint256 The length of the loan
params.signature: ZeroCollateralCommon.Signature A signature from an authorized signer

params.amount: uint256 The amount of ETH the caller is hoping to withdraw
params.loanID: uint256 The ID of the loan the collateral is for

getBorrowerLoans(address).notice: Get a list of all loans for a borrower

liquidateLoan(uint256).notice: Liquidate a loan if it is expired or undercollateralised

repay(uint256,uint256).notice: Make a payment to a loan

withdrawCollateral(uint256,uint256).notice: Withdraw collateral from a loan, unless this isn't allowed
